verses.verse: Then drew <WH7126> near the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad <WH6765>, the son <WH1121> of Hepher <WH2660>, the son <WH1121> of Gilead <WH1568>, the son <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353>, the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>, of the families <WH4940> of Manasseh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>; and these are the names <WH8034> of his daughters <WH1323>: Mahlah <WH4244>, Noah <WH5270>, and Hoglah <WH2295>, and Milcah <WH4435>, and Tirzah <WH8656>.

And they stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> Moses <WH4872>, and before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and before <WH6440> the princes <WH5387> and all the congregation <WH5712>, at the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, saying <WH559>,

Our father <WH1> died <WH4191> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and he was not among <WH8432> the company <WH5712> of them that gathered themselves together <WH3259> against Jehovah <WH3068> in the company <WH5712> of Korah <WH7141>: but he died <WH4191> in his own sin <WH2399>; and he had no sons <WH1121>.

Why should the name <WH8034> of our father <WH1> be taken away <WH1639> from among <WH8432> his family <WH4940>, because he had no son <WH1121>? Give <WH5414> unto us a possession <WH272> among <WH8432> the brethren <WH251> of our father <WH1>.
And Moses <WH4872> brought <WH7126> their cause <WH4941> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

The daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad <WH6765> speak <WH1696> right <WH3651>: thou shalt surely <WH5414> give <WH5414> them a possession <WH272> of an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> their father <WH1>'s brethren <WH251>; and thou shalt cause the inheritance <WH5159> of their father <WH1> to pass unto them <WH5674>.

And thou shalt speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, If a man <WH376> die <WH4191>, and have no son <WH1121>, then ye shall cause his inheritance <WH5159> to pass <WH5674> unto his daughter <WH1323>.
And if he have no daughter <WH1323>, then ye shall give <WH5414> his inheritance <WH5159> unto his brethren <WH251>.
And if he have no brethren <WH251>, then ye shall give <WH5414> his inheritance <WH5159> unto his father <WH1>'s brethren <WH251>.

And if his father <WH1> have no brethren <WH251>, then ye shall give <WH5414> his inheritance <WH5159> unto his kinsman <WH7607> that is next <WH7138> to him of his family <WH4940>, and he shall possess <WH3423> it <WH1121>: and it shall be unto the children of Israel <WH3478> a statute <WH2708> and ordinance <WH4941>, as Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Get thee up <WH5927> into this mountain <WH2022> of Abarim <WH5682>, and behold <WH7200> the land <WH776> which I have given <WH5414> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
And when thou hast seen <WH7200> it <WH622>, thou also shalt be gathered unto thy people <WH5971>, as Aaron <WH175> thy brother <WH251> was gathered <WH622>;

because ye rebelled <WH4784> against my word <WH6310> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790>, in the strife <WH4808> of the congregation <WH5712>, to sanctify <WH6942> me at the waters <WH4325> before their eyes <WH5869>. (These are the waters <WH4325> of Meribah <WH4809> of Kadesh <WH6946> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790>.)
And Moses <WH4872> spake <WH1696> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, saying <WH559>,
Let Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of the spirits <WH7307> of all flesh <WH1320>, appoint <WH6485> a man <WH376> over the congregation <WH5712>,

who may go out <WH3318> before <WH6440> them <WH935>, and who may come in before <WH6440> them <WH3318>, and who may lead them out, and who may bring them in <WH935>; that the congregation <WH5712> of Jehovah <WH3068> be not as sheep <WH6629> which have no shepherd <WH7462>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Take <WH3947> thee Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, a man <WH376> in whom is the Spirit <WH7307>, and lay <WH5564> thy hand upon him <WH3027>;
and set <WH5975> him before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and before <WH6440> all the congregation <WH5712>; and give him a charge <WH6680> in their sight <WH5869>.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> of thine honor <WH1935> upon him <WH5712>, that all the congregation of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> may obey <WH8085>.

And he shall stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, who shall inquire <WH7592> for him by the judgment <WH4941> of the Urim <WH224> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>: at his word <WH6310> shall they go out <WH3318>, and at his word <WH6310> they shall come in <WH935>, both he <WH1121>, and all the children of Israel <WH3478> with him <WH5712>, even all the congregation.

And Moses <WH4872> did <WH6213> as Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> him <WH3947>; and he took Joshua <WH3091>, and set <WH5975> him before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and before <WH6440> all the congregation <WH5712>:
and he laid <WH5564> his hands <WH3027> upon him <WH6680>, and gave him a charge, as Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> by <WH3027> Moses <WH4872>.
